experiences.title: Senior Editor, Author , Researcher
experiences.description: I became the first Israeli to publish a Wikipedia article and shortly there afterwards  was invited to become a Senior Editor of Wikipedia .Since 2002 I have initiated (started) over 138 Wikipedia articles on Israel ,Judaism  and the Middle East conflict , 67 on different aspects of Social Media and 34 on South Africa. I am a very strong advocate of Wikipedia in Hebrew and actively canvas multiple Israeli Government Ministries continuously to budget more finance to translate existing Wikipedia Articles in other languages to Hebrew. Hebrew Wikipedia has about 191,000 articles as of June 2016. The first article in Hebrew was published in May 2001.Wikipedia Articles are  not technically copyrighted but if its content is used , the source should be acknowledged in full and accurately and with the URL link.From its inception in 2001, Wikipedia articles have been regarded as credible and acceptable academic sources (subject to any editorial comment) Wikipedia can best be described as Crowd Editing. Anyone can register on Wikipedia and contribute to an exciting article or start one of their own. Anything added to articles are closely monitored and checked under very well defined guidelines of Wikipedia.There are absolutely no bylines or acknowledgement of authorship of Wikipedia  articles , Any contributions to Wikipedia are probono with no exceptions.The English Edition of Wikipedia has grown to over  5,171,461 articles,( as a t11th June 2016 6am GMT)equivalent to over 2,000 print volumes of the Encyclopædia Britannica. Including all language editions, Wikipedia has over 40 million articles, equivalent to over 17,000 print volumes of the last print edition of . Encyclopædia Britannica

experiences.description: 3XC Global Partners (29 Partners), now part of The Boston consulting Group ( Europe) A series of different Global Partnerships that provide Micro and Macro Management, Finance, Marketing, Branding, Restructuring and Strategy Consulting ( hands in always)Areas have I been involved in:-As a Mentor and Lead Partner to Early Stage and Seed Start Ups , we set up Start ups according to Eric Weis's Lean Start Up Philosophy and the Threshold Technology Curve Model for Start Ups and Investors ( with 12 Patents) which includes expert knowledge of Digital Marketing,Affiliate Marketing, Inbound Marketing ,Advertising ( Bid Optimization, Portfolio and Manual Management), Digital Branding, Product Development , Business Development , Financial Management and Control. 3XC Lead Partner in preparation of Marketing Plans, Competitive Analysis, R &D Project Plan, Next Stage Finance Strategy, Exit Strategy, Marking, Branding, Restructuring and Strategy Business Plan, Executive Summaries, Elevator Pitches. Documents are always prepared from the point of view of Investors, .3XC Global Partners  have agreements with over 600 colleges world wide to provide . Lecture Series in exchange for permanent advertising on their campuses offering our services and finance .This is a wonderful arrangement and beats anything a website could do hands down.My Specialties:Business and Marketing PlansDigital marketing,Marketing strategy,Social media,Business development,Customer relations,Marketing communications,Community development management General management and administationInbound and brick and mortar advertising campaigns

experiences.title: CFO ( Director of Finance , COO and COA) followed by  appointment as the Internal Auditor for 2 year
experiences.description: P&L Management, Budget and Control, Business Operations, Contracts and Legal Administration, Strategic Planning, Capital Fundraising, Site Management and Human Resources. Turned around  this 4 year old start up from a was hopelessly   insolvent position to a  very  healthy balance sheet one year later by reporting all the multiple CSO grants it had received and micromanaged two further grants and the reporting the $3.5 million Approved Enterprise Grant it had also received with a 50% increase received from a further application., The principal shareholder JCA also added a further $2.2 million with a lot of prompting but in 2003 more than recovered their investment x 4. Following a successful turnaround that included logically relocating all management functions to the plant at Kibbutz Ketura, I was appointed the external auditor/rep of the controlling shareholder for a further 2years..In  January 2013 it was valued at over $80 when part of the controlling shareholding was sold. The Company has embarked on many production expansions. It is today  the largest biocompany producing Astaxathin from the algae strain Haematoccoccus in the world  and is superbly managed from its plant in Kibbutz Ketura today.Kibbutz Ketura  is a really remarkable Kibbutz in the middle of no where , 80 kms from Eilat in the middle of the Arava Desert. It is the ultimate symbol of Israeli Enterprise, Jewish Initiative and Chochma and ,Entrepreneurship .Its  business units have been led  for over 4 decades by the highly impressionable and brilliant  Ed Hofland.JCA is the Jewish Colonial Association, established by an act of Parliament in 1888 for Baron De Hirsch. The activities of JCA in Israel are wide and varied  and include renovating tourist attractions in Israel especially in the Galilee and Negev and include Tel Chai , Tel Beer Sheva, Banias,Ancient Olive Oil and Wine Presses, Dubrovim Farm, Korazim, Tel Dan, Kfar Kama and the Petting Zoo and Nature Reserve at Kibbutz Gevaram

experiences.title: CFO, COO and Administration
experiences.description: I was the CFO  and COO of the Rescido Group then part of Queenco listed on TASE . The Group consisted of  Real Estate Redeveloper, Investments in late stage start ups  and an in house gaming start up Playsis.com with both Angels and VC Partners.(STI - Benny Steinmetz, Freddy Robinson and Yigal Zilkaall of who led TASA Listed companies)  The Real Estate Redevelopment Company was   purchased  by interests of Milamor (delisted from TASE) which have continued renovating buildings in the CBD of Tel Aviv to this day. Playsis received a substantial exit  by selling its large and high quality email  membership lists to interest belonging to Teddy Sagi. The investments in late stage High Tech company were taken over by Queenco interests.

experiences.title: Division Finance and Costing Manager
experiences.location: Holon (Head Office) with  factories in Dimona , Beer Sheva and Migdal Haemeck
experiences.description: Vishay had two distinct divisions, one manufacturing core subsidiary product lines ( Dale, Daloric, Roderstein) & the other basically every thing else.Vishay has aggressively pursued expansion by purchasing companies with product lines in play. They spun off the evolving threshold technology division, the R & D they were doing themselves .I was transitioning into the core subsidiary division.It is actually quite sad. The person I was supposed to replace knew he was terminally ill but told no one (& when you are with the company from the very first day, you can can push the transition period envelop out).My patience ran out after 18 months & he sadly died suddenly less than 2 months later .Had I known,I may have had endless patience. Nobody including myself made the observation he was ill & some worked with him from day 1.Other than obvious weight loss.Vishay Israel is one of the most profitable companies in Israel .It was established by the late Dr Felix Landsman ( in France) a Holocaust survivor as a child ( in the partisan) a Great Zionist, Businessman.& very generous Yad Vashem supporter. It received grants to build its factories in Dimona, Migdal Haemek & Beer Sheva in a smaller magnitude as Intel. x employees should be employed by the factories & well busing 5000 employees to Dimona was logistically possible if people didn't mind been picked up at 6am to start work at 6.45am , Didn't happen so amicable trade off .Was not privy to all the details negotiated by the Treasurer & CFO but "very fair play in play" Dimona is a award winning massive glass structure designed for 5000 workers who also receive a substantial sit down lunch.Vishay is one of the best managed Manufacturing.Companies,in Israel and  on top of the logistic nightmare.All production is shipped to a distribution center overseas.Vishay is a Fortune 500 Company. Vishay Israel produces over 120 million passive electronic  components daily & employs over 8500 people on Israel.

experiences.title: CFO - Revenue and Cash Flow Sources & Special Assistant to the late Director General of Ort Israel
experiences.description: Ort Israel Head Offices ( Schools and Colleges) Originally employed as Deputy Finance and Accounting in Charge of all income sources of ORT Israel, the largest independent school network in Israel and assistant to the Director General ,the late Israel Goralnick once deputy to Yigal Allon in the Palmach ( he lost n arm in the War of Independence)  liaising and regularly reporting with a major Donors who in the course of my time at Ort built and furnished Ort College Henry Braude , Karmiel  ( the first accredited college in Israel to award degrees)  paid for entirely by Baron Sir Gerald Ronso and with a little arm twisting and a lot of public relations he went on to build and furnish completely 6 additional Ort Schools in Ashkelon , Ashdod , Osafeia a/ Dalet Al Hakarmel and elsewhere  and set up a maintenance fund  for each at my suggestion.( Out of the Box thinking)  I was project manage for two very expensive IT projects and computerized other aspects of my function using advanced business models . MY final task was to start raising fund for the conversion of Ort Vocational School to High Tech Schools. A task completed by 2000. Monthly T/O of Ort Israel exceeded 2.5 billion shekels during the period I worked for there. I was also the Ort Israel Liaison with the World Ort Union in London.

educations.school: מרכז לימודים והכשרה Mercaz Limudim Vehaksara
educations.degree: Certificate in Sustainable Ecology and the Environment
educations.description:
Grade: 100
Activities and societies: Visits and hikes all over Zion
The compelling reasons why Ecology and Environment are important subjects at degree level. First, the world is faced with profound environmental and ecological challenges.
Ecology is at the heart of this  programme, with core concepts ranging from ecosystem structure and function to population dynamics. These fundamentals are complemented by applied topics including urban ecology, marine ecology, biodiversity and conservation biology, and new computer technologies such as Geographical Information Systems.

educations.major: Computer Science ( database management and languages seldom used anymore)
educations.description:
Grade: Cum Laude ( they were been generous)
Activities and societies: None
This was the first "accredited on line degree" to be recognized by the Education Ministry in Israel. It was an experiment I undertook for the Pedagogical Department of Ort Israel. Assignments were submitted with a scaled down version of Wordperfect and an early Zip ( compression program) . The Internet quite frankly did not have enough broadband . Only half the assignments were submitted over the Internet , the rest bounced and were submitted by Courier Service. The Courses revolved round Database Management and Internet Technology which of course have come a long way since then. Among the languages also studied in this degree were Pascal, an early version of C , COBOL, RPG ( for the IBM AS 400)   and Fortran and an early version of Basic .That constituted a high % of the then languages. Today there are 1000's and many have been ported to Windows.net and Linux. Part of the degree revolved round identifying viruses and there was even an exercise to actually write one =:)

Commitment to rejuvenate  the English Children's  and English Teenager section. Was very pleasantly surprised that what the Library does have are falling apart from overuse despite the fact that each book have been covered in a stick on nylon.
Accepted an invitation to join the Library Advisory Committee.

Housed in a dilapidated building in Mendes France Street, it was a wonderful surprise to find a spacious library actually been used . The Darori Foundation has committed itself to filling the English Children s section.

The Darori Foundation has committed itself to filling the (Shimon)  Peres Peace House with 1000 academic books  in the next few years on subjects relative to the Centre . The Darori Foundation has never allowed politics to interfere with its "direct" donation policy. It never donates to the bureacracy of any organisation

projects.project_name: Peres Archives at The Peres Peace House
projects.description: The Archive is continually growing as President Peres continues his career serving the State of Israel as President. On a daily basis the archive staff collect, categorise, register and preserve the many materials that are currently being produced surrounding the life and work of the President, from news articles about him or which he is quoted in, televised interviews, books and articles he writes, prizes he is awarded, private family materials and personal belongings such as photographs, artefacts, souvenirs, invitations to events, the President's speeches, including handwritten drafts and corrections, final versions both digital and on paper, all adding to the amazing collection that showcases the life and work of this inspiring man and his journey seeking peace between Israel and all its neighbors. - See more at: http://www.peres-center.org/peres_archives#sthash.2DmYqZ4h.dpuf

Beit Ariela Public Library and Cultural Center

Since 1922, Shaar Zion has been Tel Aviv's main public library. The central branch is
now located in Beit Ariela, and holds a wide selection of books in a variety of languages
(Hebrew, English, French, German and more). In addition to the main reading hall, there
are small libraries specializing in different subjects such as Dance, Music, Law and
more.

The Darori Foundation has already donated 8796 books to Beit Ariela , the Central Libray of  the City of Tel Aviv and has commited itself to donate another 1000 books.

projects.project_name: Bezalel School of Arts and Crafts
projects.description:
stablished in 1906 by artist Boris Schatz as the “Bezalel School of Arts and Crafts”, Bezalel has evolved into one of the world's most prestigious art schools.

The name Bezalel is synonymous with more than 100 years of Israeli art, innovation
and academic excellence. Bezalel’s unique strength stems from the numerous
breakthroughs it has been responsible for and its ability to respond and adapt to
cultural changes. It takes pride in its numerous generations of graduates – the
spearhead of Israeli artists, designers and architects, in Israel and around the globe.
Rge Darori Foundation has donated 6092 art books todate .

name: Stéphén Dǻrori ™ סטיבן דרורי
headline: Marketing & Financial Wiz, Publicist , Strategist, Social,Political and Consumer Activist ,Editor Israel Book Review,
about: Boundless energy & multi talented problem solver and rainmaker.I am an unconventional,sometimes controversial (in terms of out of the box solutions that work) , innovative, multidisciplinary skilled manager and Social media and brink and mortar marketer & publicist second to none. I get things done swiftly ,on time & under budget by consensus preferably or by cracking the whip when that is demanded. I cut through the crap and get to the chaseMy experience includes C Level Management, Finance, Marketing,Complex Negotiations, Publicity & Promotion Campaigns ( all aspects both social media Inbound & traditional marketing) & Journalism .I am looking for a position in either an established company or early stage start up.  I am interested in coming on board an Early Stage Start Up in Israel & can assist with all financing and accounting issues , including new financing rounds . If Technology is used fully a Finance position isn't more than 2-4 days at month end and the rest of the month severely underutilized.My name is Stephen Darori .My previous surname was Drus ( Dziedrueszyck in the 17th Century, Drueszkck;from 1856 to 1907,Drues from 1907 to 1023 and Drus from 1923 ) It still is Drus out of Israel. The American Family branch spell their name Druse. The English Family branch Druce. I hebraized my surname in 1986 to Dǻrori( דרורי in Hebrew. Dǻrori is a "Sparrow" in Biblical Hebrew. The "a' and the acute accent was added in 1987 for Branding Purposes. Ahad Ha'am ( Asher Ginsberg) an early Hebrew Poet wrote , " Cage a Sparrow and it will Die"  and from here Eliezer ben Yehuda who revived the Hebrew Language added metaphorical meanings of "Freedom" & "Liberty"

projects.description: This tool acts as a live tutor, integrated with text-to-speech. It converts handwritten math, captured through the webcam, to Latex and then solves the question with Wolfram Alpha. This "correct solution" is used to compare with the student's solution and provide feedback to the student's approach, guiding them towards the right answer.
This cutting-edge platform leverages advanced algorithms to analyze data and deliver precise insights into the Return on Investment (ROI) and estimated repair costs for your real estate investments!

projects.description: Created a fully automated trading software to trade momentum breakouts on futures (primarily ES) in C# with a Sharpe ratio of 1.3. Calculates position sizing based on market volatility, computes a probabilistic measure for trend continuation based on market conditions and technical patterns, and executes and manages risk through take profit and stop loss levels.
